AT.name: Shantae: Risky's Revenge - Director's Cut
AT.description: Shantae Risky's Revenge ist das zweite Spiel in der geschätzten Shantae-Reihe von WayForward. Es gewann 2010 sowohl die Höchstbewertung bei Metacritic und als auch den Titel des Spiel des Jahres der IGN und ist seitdem ein, Kultklassiker geworden. Die jüngste Version „Director’s Cut“ verbirgt neue Funktionen, darunter einen entzerrbaren Magie-Modus und einen ausgewogenen Spielverlauf.

movies.name: Shantae: Risky's Revenge Wii U™ Trailer

AU.name: Shantae: Risky's Revenge - Director's Cut
AU.description: Shantae Risky's Revenge is the second game in the esteemed Shantae series by WayForward. In 2010 it won both Metacritic’s highest collected ratings and IGN’s Game of the Year, and has since become a cult classic. The newest version, “Director’s Cut” is host to new features, including an unlockable Magic Mode and rebalanced gameplay.

movies.name: Shantae: Risky's Revenge Wii U™ Trailer

BG.name: Shantae: Risky's Revenge - Director's Cut
BG.description: Winner of IGN’s Game of the Year and Metacritic’s highest rated game of 2010, reborn! Shantae: Risky’s Revenge – Director’s Cut is a powder keg of high octane, hair-whipping, hip shaking action! Features thousands of frames of animation, huge multi-sprite bosses, and a quest so big it’s bursting at the seams. Guide “half-genie” Shantae through haunted wastes, burning deserts, enchanted forests, dripping caverns and deadly labyrinths. Discover magical attacks, brew zombie coffee, save golden babies, and master the art of belly-dancing to transform Shantae into more powerful creatures. Use your powers to foil the lady pirate Risky Boots and save Sequin Land from certain doom! With its infectious characters, flirtatious humor and deliciously outlandish action, Shantae: Risky’s Revenge offers up all the hair-whipping, belly-dancing action you can handle! Now with new features, including unlockable Magic Mode and rebalanced gameplay.

movies.name: Shantae: Risky's Revenge Wii U™ Trailer

BE.name: Shantae: Risky's Revenge - Director's Cut
BE.description: Shantae : Risky's Revenge est le second volet de la très estimée saga Shantae développée par WayForward. En 2010, le jeu a, à la fois, obtenu le meilleur score de l'année de Metacritic – score faisant la synthèse de différentes critiques – et été élu «Jeu de l'année» par IGN. Depuis, le jeu est devenu un classique culte. La dernière version, «Director's Cut», dévoile des nouveautés, dont un Mode Magie déverrouillable et un gameplay recalibré.

movies.name: Shantae: Risky's Revenge Wii U™ bande-annonce

movies.name: Shantae: Risky's Revenge Wii U™ Trailer

ES.name: Shantae: Risky's Revenge - Director's Cut
ES.description: Shantae Risky's Revenge es el segundo juego de la valorada serie Shantae de WayForward. En el año 2010 obtuvo la mayor calificación registrada de Metacritic y fue el juego del año de IGN, y se ha convertido ya en un clásico de culto. La versión más reciente, “Director’s Cut”, trae nuevas características, incluyendo un modo mágico desbloqueable y jugabilidad reajustada.

movies.name: Shantae: Risky's Revenge Wii U™ Tráiler

IT.name: Shantae: Risky's Revenge - Director's Cut
IT.description: Shantae Risky's Revenge è il secondo gioco dell' apprezzata serie Shantae di WayForward. Nel 2010 ha vinto sia il posto più alto nella classifica dei voti aggregati di Metacritic, sia il titolo di Gioco dell'Anno di IGN, e da allora è diventato un titolo di culto. La versione più recente, la “Director's Cut”, offre nuove caratteristiche, inclusa una Modalità Magia sbloccabile e un gameplay ribilanciato.

movies.name: Shantae: Risky's Revenge Wii U™ Trailer

Shantae: Risky’s Revenge – Director’s Cut is a powder keg of high octane, hair-whipping, hip shaking action! Features thousands of frames of animation, huge multi-sprite bosses, and a quest so big it’s bursting at the seams. Guide “half-genie” Shantae through haunted wastes, burning deserts, enchanted forests, dripping caverns and deadly labyrinths. Discover magical attacks, brew zombie coffee, save golden babies, and master the art of belly-dancing to transform Shantae into more powerful creatures. Use your powers to foil the lady pirate Risky Boots and save Sequin Land from certain doom! With its infectious characters, flirtatious humor and deliciously outlandish action, Shantae: Risky’s Revenge offers up all the hair-whipping, belly-dancing action you can handle! Now with new features, including unlockable Magic Mode and rebalanced gameplay.
